name: Top Gun Day - I Was Inverted T-Shirt
description: More shirts on the way! They should arrive by Friday 5/6 or Monday 5/9. If you order now I will get them in the mail as soon as they arrive. If they go out on Monday most should receive them by 5/13. Regardless, they are great to wear any day of the year! All the new tees will be black, high-quality American Apparel shirts. To order select the size you'd like from the drop down menu below. Shipping is included in the price for orders shipped in the USA. For international orders please email us first at orders@topgunday.com and we'll work out the shipping costs. Check out, "Shipping, Returns, and Payments" for more info. Thanks to all Top Gun fans and Top Gun Day supporters! • TopGunDay.com • Join Our Facebook Fan Page
